tasks.label: Kill ROS/Gazebo
args: echo 'Thorough ROS/Gazebo cleanup...'; ros2 daemon stop 2>/dev/null || true; ps aux | grep -E '(ros|gazebo|gz|nav2|slam|rqt|rviz|apriltag|pointcloud)' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 2; REMAINING=$(ps aux | grep -E '(ros|gazebo|gz|nav2|slam)' | grep -v grep | wc -l); echo "Remaining processes: $REMAINING"; echo 'Cleanup complete!'

tasks.label: turtlebot
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch simple_commander simple_turtlebot4.launch.py world:=april_maze
